Package GJIM

Class Image

java.lang.Object
GJIM.Image
public class Image extends Object
Object containing data of an Image.

    • extract

      public Image extract(int p1, int c1, int p2, int c2)
      Extracts a part of the image to create a new one with given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      p1 - First coordinate of a corner of the area
      c1 - Second coordinate of a corner of the area
      p2 - First coordinate of the opposite corner of the area
      c2 - Second coordinate of the opposite corner of the area
      Returns:
      Image The extracted Image
